lines.text: Why do they always pick on my hat?
I hope you live long enough to tell Randall what I did to his girl.
I love to watch a good fight. And you're pretty good.
If I was a tree, I'd hide in a forest.

[fighting Randall]
You're good Mister Randall. But you're not good enough.

[to Ramandi]
Nice place you've got here.
Bravest man I ever knew was a homosexual.
Never let your girlfriend hold your piece.
